greeting: Hello! Welcome to Food Finder YYC.

askDay.text:
Are you looking for food for:

(1) Today
(2) Tomorrow

askLocationType.text:
How would you like to tell us your location?

(1) Address
(2) Intersection
(3) Closest Public or Catholic School

askAddress.text: What is your address? (example: 101 9 Ave SW)
askAddress.errorFormat: We didn't find the address %s. Please confirm the address is correct or try a different method.

askIntersection1.text: What is the name or street number of the first street or avenue at the intersection? (example: Kensington Rd)

askIntersection2.text: What is the name or street number of the second street or avenue at the intersection? (example: 14 St)
askIntersection2.errorFormat: We didn't find the intersection of %s and %s. Please confirm the street names or try a different method.

askPlace.text: What is the name of the school closest to you? (example: Alex Munro)
askPlace.errorFormat: We didn't recognize the school %s. Please confirm the school name or try a different method.

results: Here are the closest locations to %s %s:
goodbye: Thank you for using Food Finder YYC! Remember to add us to your contact info for future reference.
noResults: We didn't find any available locations. Please try again later or call 211 for a referral to local meal programs.
